revised_title: Spectroscopic Analysis of Conformational Differences in Prion Protein
tldr: The article investigates the conformational differences between the cellular prion protein (PrPc) and its infectious form (PrPSc) using spectroscopic methods like Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy. The study reveals that PrPc is rich in alpha-helix, while PrPSc has a higher beta-sheet content. This conformational transition is crucial for understanding prion diseases.
